product_name: CamelBak Zoid Hydration Snow Pack - Men's
long_description: Sporting a slick, lift-friendly design, the Zoid hydration pack stores your bare essentials and a whopping 2 liters of water, letting you spend more time in the powder without fogging up in the lodge.
short_description: Sporting a slick, lift-friendly design, the Zoid hydration pack stores your bare essentials and a whopping 2 liters of water, letting you spend more time in the powder without fogging up in the lodge.
